sentences.en: A blackbird broke in on his reverie with an evening song.
sentences.cn: 一只山鸟的晚歌打断了他的遐想.

sentences.en: A blackbird flew down and perched on the parapet outside his window.
sentences.cn: 一只乌鸫飞下来，停在他窗外的矮墙上。

sentences.en: Everything in the Blackbird had to be pioneered.
In the utter silence a blackbird shouted.
sentences.cn: 在异常的寂静中,一只画眉鸟啼叫着.

sentences.en: It was quiet. A redwing blackbird sat on fence wire and looked in at her.
sentences.cn: 周围静悄悄, 一只红翼鸫鸟栖息在铁丝网上望着她.

sentences.en: North American blackbird whose bluish - black plumage is rusty - edged in the fall.
sentences.cn: 北美洲乌鸫,其蓝黑色的羽毛在秋天呈现铁锈红色的边.

sentences.en: North American blackbird with scarlet patches on the wings.
sentences.cn: 翅膀上有红色斑点的北美洲乌鸫.

sentences.en: Now and then a blackbird would call.
The blackbird , like most birds breeds in the spring.
sentences.cn: 黑鸟像大多数鸟一样在春天孵小鸟.

sentences.en: The blackbird had a quick, wary look in case the cat was anywhere around.
sentences.cn: 这只乌鸫迅速警惕地张望了一眼，以防那只猫就在附近。

sentences.en: The blackbird whirled in the autumn winds.
The blackbird's nest contained four eggs.
The price tag on a Blackbird Rider Acoustic Guitar is $ 1 , 599.
sentences.cn: 价格标签上黑鸟莱德原声吉他元, 1519.

sentences.en: We have never seen more beauty than that in a blackbird.
sentences.cn: 我们从未看见比一只乌鸦更多的美丽.

sentences.en: When down came a blackbird And snapped off her nose.
sentences.cn: 一只黑画眉飞来,啄走了她的鼻子.
